short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WONDR's extension helps you quickly save a web link along with any notes and insights, directly to your projects.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WONDR is built to support lifelong learners. As the world changes, the way we learn is also changing. We’re here to support you as you explore your interests, up-skill in your career and follow your passions. 

We’ve created a browser extension to support you as you browse the web. This helps you easily capture and collect links, resources and information you find online. Add notes to the links you find and create projects to organise your interests. 

WONDR also connects you with people who share your interests and values. Collaborating on WONDR helps you accelerate your progress towards career or life ambitions. Follow or join other people’s projects to share insights, research, and experiences to progress in the things you enjoy most. 
Never lose your sense of wonder!
